name: RetrieveEmbedItemInfo
description:
Retrieve information for a specific embed item on a board.

Use this tool to get details about a specific embed item from a Miro board. It requires the board ID and item ID to retrieve the information. Useful for accessing embed details within a Miro board.

parameters.name: board_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the Miro board to retrieve a specific embed item.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which you want to retrieve a specific item.

parameters.name: embed_item_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the embed item to retrieve from the board.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item that you want to retrieve.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the miro API.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which you want to retrieve a specific item.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which you want to retrieve a specific item.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item that you want to retrieve.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item that you want to retrieve.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
